thread.section_title: Hotel Diva Opera - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Sweet hotel, great location
thread.title_full: Sweet hotel, great location - Review of Hotel Diva Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Gillian J
title: Sweet hotel, great location
text: Lovely hotel near bars, restaurants and even a mall lol, about a 10 minute Uber ride to the Louve, I had a great modern room, very comfortable bed, I was street side but there was no noise disturbance. The bathroom was a great size and modern, The only thing I wish it had was a USB port because my charger didn't work. Other than that I highly recommend this hotel, you can walk outside anytime go down the street and be surrounded by lovely people, bars, restaurants etc. in the heart of Paris
